the X86 can make it compatible with windows software, also compatible with win 7 or XP software.
The Excelvan 11.6"Intel X86 Ultrabook with Intel CPU: Low power consumption & powerful operation capability.
Operation System: W8 Trial Version. 11.6" high screen display resolution with 1366*768, IPS capacitive multi-touch screen

We only provide operation system: W8 Trial Version Operation System, please buy & install genuine W8 operation system or buy & install other genuine version operation system after buying our tablet. The Excelvan 11.6"Intel X86 Ultrabook has a SIM Port, its only for design requirement not for normal operation.
